long_description: Ready for leisurely day trips on smooth water, the Emotion Kayaks Darter Kayak brings a full array of features at an incredible value to the casual paddler. Beginners will love the confidence-inspiring initial stability that's built into the hull; stern keel and tracking channels help keep new paddlers going in a straight line. Short length and 40 lb. weight allows you to carry the kayak on your own. Polyethylene hull resists abrasion and UV light, and it offers good looks at a great value. Specialized blowmolding process produces a strong hull of consistent quality. Large cockpit opening makes it easy to get into the boat with some extra gear; flared bow offers lots of leg room. Adjustable foot pegs promote a comfortable paddling position for a wide range of paddlers. Molded seat enhances comfort; a beverage holder keeps refreshment close by and also stores small accessories. Foam block in stern enhances flotation and makes it easier to handle a water-logged boat. Fore and aft deck rigging; paddle holder; toggle handles.
short_description: Ready for leisurely day trips on smooth water, the Emotion Kayaks Darter Kayak brings a full array of features at an incredible value to the casual paddler.
